items.sentence: Is your stomach pain dull, sharp, cramping, or something else?
If ghosts aren't real, then why am I looking at one right now?
I'd buy Tom a beer, but I think he's still too young to drink.
Let's not forget to thank Tom for everything he's done for us.
Let's not forget that Tom was the one who caused this problem.
For the rest of the lesson, I'm only going to speak in French.
Somebody has confessed to the crime that Tom is in prison for.
I dropped by Tom's on the way home and had a couple of drinks.
The submarine's periscope was sticking right out of the water.
Tom spends all day in his workshop, making things he can sell.
I wonder whether or not Tom knows where I can buy what I need.
I agreed with her suggestion that we meet again in five years.
Do you think there's any chance Tom knows Mary's phone number?
Can you remember the first time that you ever used a computer?
You may injure yourself if you don't follow safety procedures.
My family is still working, so I can't go to Texas right away.
It's about time that someone did something about that problem.
I make a point of writing an answer as soon as I get a letter.
I don't want a Ferrari bad enough to sell my house to get one.
I'd like to treat you to lunch to thank you for all your help.
